name: roastbeefssoulmate
text: A comment left by roastbeefssoulmate was marked as spam and excluded. roastbeefssoulmate: What a douche. (reported by gothfae, Magb, heatbag)

name: spamantha
text: A comment left by spamantha was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nbgreene, kenthegod, deovalente)

name: catachresis
text: I think it's more awesome seeing Ray to be totally stupid about code language

name: howard
text: I think it's more awesome seeing Ray burp his name.

name: cicadalek
text: I think it's more awesome that there's an implication he's been doing it since Beef left.

name: ralgnar
text: how do you figure?

name: hyetal
text: Uh, it's Ray .

name: brokebackmark
text: I think it's more awesome that RB was using code to get a sub order from his man

name: zaratustra
text: I thought that he was like "well now that you blew the code might as well get some sandwiches"

name: maidenathene
text: I come from the future to sat that i agree.

name: irondave
text: Agreed.  He can't even bother to pay attention to his own personal crises.

name: pogo
text: Burp language is awesome.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Ray burps to the station logo tune for N.B.C.

name: stormagnet
text: Stage whispering stuff like this in public was one of my chief occupations when I was 12. That, and seeing how long I could carry a conversation conducted entirely in Simpson's quotes.

name: heccibiggs
text: I'm not sure whether you're implying that you were cool or a loser, and I'm not sure what I'm inferring either.

name: stormagnet
text: I like to think that I was precociously talented at being a loser. Losers nowadays? Largely nonsense.

name: kickstart
text: I used to like the losers, but now, not so much.

name: cbtbone
text: Maybe I change, maybe they change.  Who knows?

name: fermatprime
text:
chubbied for "largely nonsense." have I been up all night reading achewood instead of studying for finals? have I?

yes.

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nbgreene, tttt, Connellingus)

name: lizjones
text: Is that Ray's phone call jacket? It seems to appear frequently when he's on the phone.

name: joebot
text: I think that's his martini-sippin' jacket.

name: cdl146
text: Definitely phone jacket.

name: laserblade
text: It is his phone jacket. This means that somehow, he can anticipate incoming calls, and put it on at least three panels ahead of time.

name: senseihollywood
text: Ray always knows the Phrase That Pays...

name: woodenteeth
text: Phone Jacket! PHONE JACKET! Oh god. It's totally true. Not every time. But most times. Onstad is doing this on purpose. I love it, but man Onstad is a broken boy.

name: ghoti
text:
"but man Onstad is a broken boy."

What does that even MEAN?

name: woodenteeth
text: It means his brain operates in way that many would find "broken". All shooting off in random directions. Clothing his characters to denote activity.

name: farqussus
text: I can't believe you dignified that with a response.

name: woodenteeth
text: I'm not very dignified, so it's ok.

name: songbirdspectre
text: neither is ray. he burps his own name.

name: songbirdspectre
text: PS: i love Phone Jacket.

name: molesticide
text: he was wearing the jacket before the phone rang

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Ray has a sense about these such things.

name: salo
text:
How else would he have ready access to the cell stored within?

It seems that he was expecting a call, just not from Roeast Beef...

name: stormagnet
text: He was expecting KWIN 107.7- being able to burp his own name was probably the condition for the prize.

name: snowman
text: KWIN operates on the honor system, apparently.

name: kickstart
text: I'm still laughing at "The station that gives gifts to the nation."

name: greyfield
text:
I am very tempted to produce a fake T-shirt for this station.

Oh, cafepress, what can't you do?

name: usversusthem
text:
May I, perhaps, be of assistance?

[IMGS OFF]

name: howl
text: In Seattle, the local alternative station is KNDD 107.7 The End.

name: shutup_shutup
text: The difference is that The End is not a station giving gifts to the nation.  The End is a gift to no one.

name: howl
text: That is very, very true. Unless, you know, you like bad music. Alternative bad music.

name: theguitarhero
text: Bad music that is the alternative to good music.

name: caddon
text:
I'm still wondering if Ray was burping phonetically or not. Is he burping "AR" "AY" "WHY" or "RR" "AY" "EE"?
THE WORLD MAY NEVER KNOW.
